name: RPG-Platformer(Demo, kind of)
description:
This is my first game/prototype for a game, platformer meets RPG.

I uploaded it here so I could get some player feedback before I continue any further and to see if people would be interested in something like this, so please comment down below to let me know.

CONTROLs

Movement: WASD keys

Attack: Left mouse click

Jump: Space bar

Comment

Please comment on anything you think I should change or add

Tell me if you would play a game like this if it was complete with a more polished look and animations, with more RPG elements, Storyline, and a lot more content.
